long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the dark, intense world of Berserk with this Incredible Guts live wallpaper! If you're a fan of the iconic mercenary and his legendary journey, this extension will immerse you in the raw power and struggle of Guts every time you open a new tab. Watch as Guts, with his massive Dragonslayer sword and unrelenting spirit, animates your screen, bringing his fierce battles and relentless determination to life. The powerful scenes capture his grit, anger, and the energy that defines Berserk, making every tab feel like an epic chapter in his story.

This extension isn‚Äôt just about epic visuals, though. It also comes with practical features to streamline your browsing experience. You can access your favorite websites instantly with customizable shortcuts, perform quick searches via the integrated Google search bar, and stay on top of time with the clock and date widget. Whether you're deep in the world of Berserk or just browsing, this extension combines immersive graphics with helpful tools.

Bring the incredible world of Berserk to your browser and feel the power of Guts in every new tab. It‚Äôs time to channel your inner warrior!
